notes.title: Data Availability
notes.p: Raw sequence data have been deposited on the NCBI Sequence Read Archive under BioProject Accession IDs PRJNA312223 (SRA: SRP070198) and PRJNA312234 (SRA: SRP191784). Associated numerical data underlying the main results and figures have been deposited on figshare (doi: 10.6084/m9.figshare.7871912). Custom scripts developed for data filtering and population genetic analysis have been archived in GitHub ( https://github.com/tplinderoth/ngsQC doi: 10.5281/zenodo.2592044, https://github.com/tplinderoth/ABCutils doi: 10.5281/zenodo.2591546).
